pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dynamic Hazard Models using State Space Models // Contains functions that lets you fit dynamic hazard models using state space models. The first implemented model is described in Fahrmeir (1992) doi:10.1080/01621459.1992.10475232 and Fahrmeir (1994) doi:10.1093/biomet/81.2.317. Extensions hereof are available where the Extended Kalman filter is replaced by an unscented Kalman filter and other options including particle filters.
